articles.author: Sibusiso Mjikeliso
articles.title: 13-man Sharks beat Harlequins in enthralling, controversial Champions Cup opener - News24
articles.description: Both sides scored five tries, Ox Nche suffered a red card, three players scored doubles as the Sharks beat Harlequins 39-31 in an enthralling, yet controversial first South African game in the European Champions Cup at Kings Park on Saturday.
articles.content: South Africa’s historic first game as European Champions Cup participants had all the ingredients of refereeing drama, thrilling finishes and spectacular tries that rugby lovers enjoy as the Sharks b… [+4168 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Japanese dengue vaccine becomes second approved by EU - GMA News Online
articles.description: Japanese pharmaceutical company Takeda said the European Union had given the green light to its dengue fever vaccine, making it the second jab preventing the disease to be approved by the bloc.
articles.content: TOKYO, Japan - Japanese pharmaceutical company Takeda said the European Union had given the green light to its dengue fever vaccine, making it the second jab preventing the disease to be approved by … [+1078 chars]
